channel.title: How many right click options can there be?
channel.description: I'm wondering how many right click options there are such as walk here, attack, trade, follow, etc. I'm wondering this because I was thinking of adding a right click ban. Is there an unlimited amount you can make or just limited? Right now they're all walk here, attack, follow, trade with, and kick. Could I possibly add "Ban" under the kick option?

item.title: How many right click options can there be?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I did try. I think all it does it display the text, not the actions itself…

Read full topic

@o.O_O.o wrote:

Find out what the writeString(“Kick”); is doing.

item.title: How many right click options can there be?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Here’s an example of something I really don’t understand:

if (playerRights > 0) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Kick"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

That’s my code to display the right click “Kick” option. Now how the hell does that make it kick the user? Where in that code does it connect with the ::kick command…? I tried to find out what all those outStreams are but it’s not giving me any clues…

Read full topic
item.source: How many right click options can there be?
